theAya:SpeedUp.NAME: 加速
theAya:SpeedUp.DESCRIPTION: 从 *流云疾行 和 *腾空之翼 中选择1张加入你的手牌.
theAya:SpeedUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 从 *流云疾行+ 和 *腾空之翼+ 中选择1张加入你的手牌.

theAya:WingsOfAscend.NAME: 腾空之翼
theAya:WingsOfAscend.DESCRIPTION: 获得1点 theaya:飞行 . NL theaya:风力 !M! : 额外获得1点 theaya:飞行 . NL 消耗 .
theAya:WingsOfAscend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得1点 theaya:飞行 . NL theaya:风力 !M! : 额外获得1点 theaya:飞行 . NL 消耗 .

theAya:CloudstreamSprint.NAME: 流云疾行
theAya:CloudstreamSprint.DESCRIPTION: 抽1张牌. NL theaya:风力 !M! : 额外抽一张牌 NL 消耗 .
theAya:CloudstreamSprint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 抽1张牌. NL theaya:风力 !M! : 额外抽一张牌 NL 消耗 .

theAya:SpinStrike.NAME: 旋转打击
theAya:SpinStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. NL 这场战斗中每次被抽到,提升 !M! 点伤害.

theAya:MapleDance.NAME: 丹枫之扇舞
theAya:MapleDance.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !theAya:CardWindSpeed! 点 theaya:风速 . NL 这场战斗中每次被抽到,提升 !M! 点风速.

theAya:SwiftWindFan.NAME: 疾风扇
theAya:SwiftWindFan.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. NL theaya:风力 !M! : 再攻击一次.

theAya:TenguSpirit.NAME: 天狗之魂
theAya:TenguSpirit.DESCRIPTION: 每回合开始,获得 [E] NL 和20点 theaya:风速 .

theAya:GaleAssault.NAME: 狂风突袭
theAya:GaleAssault.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. NL theaya:风力 !M! , theaya:持续技 : NL 获得1点 力量 ,在回合结束时失去它.

theAya:Landing.NAME: 着陆
theAya:Landing.DESCRIPTION: theaya:空中技 , theaya:着陆 : 获得 !M! 点 无实体 . NL 消耗 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须至少有1点飞行去使用这张牌.

theAya:WindborneGlide.NAME: 疾风翱翔
theAya:WindborneGlide.DESCRIPTION: 保留 . NL 获得1点 theaya:飞行 和15点 theaya:风速 .每当这张牌被保留时,将其在本场战斗的耗能减少1.
theAya:WindborneGlide.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 保留 . 固有 . NL 获得1点 theaya:飞行 和15点 theaya:风速 .每当这张牌被保留时,将其在本场战斗的耗能减少1.

theAya:Instamatic.NAME: 袖珍相机
theAya:Instamatic.DESCRIPTION: 选择1张手牌,获得它的 theaya:快照 . NL 消耗 . NL 虚无 .
theAya:Instamatic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 选择1张手牌,获得它的 theaya:快照 . NL 消耗 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 选择一张牌并生成1张它的快照

theAya:SpreadRumors.NAME: 传谣
theAya:SpreadRumors.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !M! 点虚弱. NL 造成 !M! 点易伤.

theAya:TempestWrath.NAME: 暴风之怒
theAya:TempestWrath.DESCRIPTION: 每回合开始, NL 如果处于 theaya:进攻之风 , NL 获得1点 力量 .

theAya:GentleBreeze.NAME: 清风
theAya:GentleBreeze.DESCRIPTION: 每回合开始, NL 如果处于 theaya:治愈之风 , NL 获得5点临时血量.

theAya:NocturnalTempest.NAME: 暗夜狂风
theAya:NocturnalTempest.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. NL 造成1点 theaya:颤抖 . NL theaya:风力 !M! : 额外造成1点 theaya:颤抖 .

theAya:Leap.NAME: 飞跃
theAya:Leap.DESCRIPTION: 消耗1张牌, NL 获得 !M! 点 theaya:风速 .

theAya:WindBlade.NAME: 风刃
theAya:WindBlade.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. NL theaya:风力 !M! : 额外造成8点伤害.

theAya:Accelerator.NAME: 极速装置
theAya:Accelerator.DESCRIPTION: 翻倍当前拥有的 theaya:风速 . NL 消耗 .

theAya:TheClutchClaw.NAME: 飞翔爪
theAya:TheClutchClaw.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 点 theaya:飞行 . NL 消耗 .

theAya:AirplaneMode.NAME: 飞行模式
theAya:AirplaneMode.DESCRIPTION: 每回合获得3点 theaya:飞行 .

theAya:Dive.NAME: 俯冲
theAya:Dive.DESCRIPTION: theaya:空中技 , theaya:着陆 : 每有1点 theaya:飞行 ,造成 !D! 点伤害一次.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须至少有1点飞行去使用这张牌.

theAya:WindSurge.NAME: 风涌
theAya:WindSurge.DESCRIPTION: theaya:空中技 , theaya:风力 !M! : 下回合获得 [E] [E] .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须至少有1点飞行去使用这张牌.

theAya:CrowShadow.NAME: 乌鸦的暗影
theAya:CrowShadow.DESCRIPTION: 获得10点 theaya:风速 和2点 theaya:飞行 .
theAya:CrowShadow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得15点 theaya:风速 和3点 theaya:飞行 .

theAya:ScytheWindVeil.NAME: 镰风面纱
theAya:ScytheWindVeil.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点格挡和 !B! 点 theaya:风速 .

theAya:Flow.NAME: 流动
theAya:Flow.DESCRIPTION: 抽取 !M! 张手牌,丢弃 !M! 张手牌. NL theaya:风力 10: 结束后再抽1张牌.

theAya:Advertisement.NAME: 广告
theAya:Advertisement.DESCRIPTION: 选择1张手牌,获得它的 theaya:快照 ,其费用加2,执行X次.
theAya:Advertisement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 选择1张手牌,获得它的 theaya:快照 ,其费用加2,执行X+1次.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 选择1张牌并生成1张它的快照

theAya:Industrialization.NAME: 工业化
theAya:Industrialization.DESCRIPTION: 手牌中所有 theaya:快照 费用减X.
theAya:Industrialization.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 手牌中所有 theaya:快照 费用减X+1.

theAya:TenguDailyReport.NAME: 天狗报当日截稿
theAya:TenguDailyReport.DESCRIPTION: 选择1张手牌,获得两张它的 theaya:快照 ,其费用加1. NL theaya:风力 !M! :快照不添加额外费用.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 选择1张牌并生成1张它的快照

theAya:CatapultLaunch.NAME: 弹射起步
theAya:CatapultLaunch.DESCRIPTION: 如果没有 theaya:飞行 ,获得3点飞行和20 theaya:风速 ,否则获得1飞行.

theAya:TemporaryTruce.NAME: 暂时休战
theAya:TemporaryTruce.DESCRIPTION: 失去二分之一的 theaya:风速 ,下回合返还2倍失去的风速.
theAya:TemporaryTruce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 失去二分之一的 theaya:风速 ,下回合返还3倍失去的风速.

theAya:FieryCombo.NAME: 火热连击
theAya:FieryCombo.DESCRIPTION: 本回合如果处于 theaya:进攻之风 ,每打出1张牌获得1点 力量 . NL theaya:风力 20:先进入进攻之风.

theAya:WindShield.NAME: 风之守护
theAya:WindShield.DESCRIPTION: 本回合如果处于 theaya:抵御之风 ,获得20点防御. NL theaya:风力 10:保留防御到下回合.

theAya:Heal.NAME: 愈合
theAya:Heal.DESCRIPTION: 本回合如果处于 theaya:治愈之风 ,将临时血量转变为血量. NL theaya:风力 10:先进入治愈之风.

theAya:WindGodGirl.NAME: 风神少女
theAya:WindGodGirl.DESCRIPTION: 如果处于 theaya:翱翔之风 ,将 theaya:风速 翻 !M! 倍. NL theaya:风力 10:先进入翱翔之风.

theAya:TurbulentLand.NAME: 动荡之地
theAya:TurbulentLand.DESCRIPTION: 进入随机风种, NL theaya:风力 10: 获得20点 theaya:风速 .
theAya:TurbulentLand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 进入随机风种,获得20点 theaya:风速 .

theAya:OffensiveStance.NAME: 进攻姿态
theAya:OffensiveStance.DESCRIPTION: 进入 theaya:进攻之风 ,获得3点临时力量.
theAya:OffensiveStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 进入 theaya:进攻之风 ,获得3点临时力量,获得10点 theaya:风速 .

theAya:ShiftingTengu.NAME: 变换的鸦天狗
theAya:ShiftingTengu.DESCRIPTION: 每次切换风种,获得10点 theaya:风速 .

theAya:DefensiveStance.NAME: 防御姿态
theAya:DefensiveStance.DESCRIPTION: 进入 theaya:抵御之风 ,获得10点格挡.
theAya:DefensiveStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 进入 theaya:抵御之风 ,获得10点格挡,获得10点 theaya:风速 .

theAya:Convection.NAME: 对流
theAya:Convection.DESCRIPTION: 每获得30点 theaya:风速 ,对所有敌人造成3点伤害.
